verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and reigned <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, yet not as the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

Against him came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8022>Shalmaneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> became his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H4503>tribute<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> in <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%>; for he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5471>So<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> no <S%H4503>tribute<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, as he had done <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year<s%>: therefore the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> shut him <S%H6113>up<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him in <S%H1004>prison<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

In the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> unto <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and <S%H3427>placed<s%> them in <S%H2477>Halah<s%>, and on the <S%H2249>Habor<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H1470>Gozan<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes<s%>.

And it was <S%H1121>so<s%>, because the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and had <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>,

and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H6213>made<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H2644>secretly<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> that were not right against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>: and they <S%H1129>built<s%> them high <S%H1116>places<s%> in all their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H5341>watchmen<s%> to the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>;
and they set them <S%H5324>up<s%> <S%H4676>pillars<s%> and <S%H842>Asherim<s%> upon every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>;

and there they burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in all the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, as did the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>; and they wrought <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> to provoke <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%>;
and they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%>, whereof <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>them<s%>, Ye shall not do this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

Yet <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5749>testified<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and unto <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3027>by<s%> every <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and every <S%H2374>seer<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7725>Turn<s%> ye from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, according to all the <S%H8451>law<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and which I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you <S%H3027>by<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%H8085><s%>, they would not hear, but <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck<s%>, like to the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, who <S%H539>believed<s%> not in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> which he <S%H5749>testified<s%> unto <S%H3212>them<s%>; and they followed <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and became <S%H1891>vain<s%>, and went <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, concerning whom Jehovah had <S%H6680>charged<s%> them that they should not do like <S%H6213>them<s%>.

And they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> them molten <S%H4541>images<s%>, even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H842>Asherah<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.

And they caused their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H7080>used<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%> and <S%H5172>enchantments<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> themselves to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5493>removed<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight<s%>: there was none <S%H7604>left<s%> but the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of Judah <S%H3063>only<s%>.

Also <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> not the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, but <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which they <S%H6213>made<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, and delivered them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H8154>spoilers<s%>, until he had <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight<s%>.

For he <S%H7167>rent<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>; and they made <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>: and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H5080>drove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and made them <S%H2398>sin<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>; they departed not from <S%H5493>them<s%>;

until <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of his <S%H6440>sight<s%>, as he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>. So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was carried <S%H1540>away<s%> out of their own <S%H127>land<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> men from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and from <S%H3575>Cuthah<s%>, and from <S%H5755>Avva<s%>, and from <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> and <S%H5617>Sepharvaim<s%>, and <S%H3427>placed<s%> them in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> instead of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the cities <S%H5892>thereof<s%>.

And so it <S%H8462>was<s%>, at the beginning of their <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H3372>there<s%>, that they feared not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: therefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> among <S%H2026>them<s%>, which killed some of them.

Wherefore they <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H1471>nations<s%> which thou hast <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H3427>away<s%>, and placed in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: therefore he hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> among <S%H4191>them<s%>, and, behold, they slay <S%H3045>them<s%>, because they know not the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Carry<s%> thither <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> whom ye <S%H1540>brought<s%> from <S%H3212>thence<s%>; and let them go and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3384>there<s%>, and let him teach them the <S%H4941>law<s%> of the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

So <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> whom they had carried <S%H1540>away<s%> from <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H3384>taught<s%> them how they should <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Howbeit every <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> of their <S%H3240>own<s%>, and put them in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which the <S%H8118>Samaritans<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>, every <S%H1471>nation<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> wherein they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5524>Succoth-benoth<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3575>Cuth<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5370>Nergal<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H807>Ashima<s%>,

and the <S%H5757>Avvites<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5026>Nibhaz<s%> and <S%H8662>Tartak<s%>; and the <S%H5616>Sepharvites<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H152>Adrammelech<s%> and <S%H6048>Anammelech<s%>, the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H5617>Sepharvaim<s%>.

So they <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> unto them from among <S%H7098>themselves<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, who <S%H6213>sacrificed<s%> for them in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

They <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> their own <S%H430>gods<s%>, after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from among whom they had been carried <S%H1540>away<s%>.

Unto this <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%>: they <S%H3373>fear<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, neither <S%H6213>do<s%> they after their <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, or after their <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, or after the <S%H8451>law<s%> or after the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, whom he <S%H7760>named<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

with whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, nor <S%H7812>bow<s%> yourselves to <S%H5647>them<s%>, nor serve <S%H2076>them<s%>, nor sacrifice to them:

but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, him shall ye <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and unto him shall ye <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H2076>yourselves<s%>, and to him shall ye sacrifice:

and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> for <S%H8104>you<s%>, ye shall observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3117>evermore<s%>; and ye shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>:
and the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that I have <S%H3772>made<s%> with you ye shall not <S%H7911>forget<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>:
but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall ye <S%H3372>fear<s%>; and he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Howbeit they did not <S%H8085>hearken<s%>, but they <S%H6213>did<s%> after their <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%>.

So these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> their graven <S%H6456>images<s%>; their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1121>likewise<s%>, and their children's <S%H1121>children<s%>, as <S%H6213>did<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, so <S%H6213>do<s%> they unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
